name: Deck Delvers
description:
This is a game I made for Mini Jam 109: Depths. All the art and code was done by me in 72 hours. It is absolutely incomplete and really buggy since I just wanted to get something submitted. I really like the idea for the game and plan on polishing it into something nice.

In the current build all card effects are applied even if you reroll, so reroll as much as you want to stack a bunch of effects.

Many cards remain unimplemented in the game and so don't convey any actual effect, however I plan to keep updating the game!

The game is basically my version of Vampire Survivors since I've been playing a lot of that recently.
